Chapter 1 Introduction to Vectors
=================================

.. note::

   **Linear combination** 
   :math:`c\v + d \w
   = c\bb 1 \\ 1 \eb
   + d\bb 2 \\ 3 \eb
   = \bb c + 2d \\ c + 3d \eb`

The vectors :math:`c\bs{v}` lie along a line. When :math:`\bs{w}` is not on that
line, **the combinations** :math:`c\bs{v} + d\bs{w}` **fill the whole
two-dimensional plane**.
